attributes.name: type
attributes.desc: type of input, see more in MDN
attributes.optionValue: text | textarea | number | password | email | search | tel |  url

attributes.name: model-value
attributes.desc: binding value

attributes.name: v-model
attributes.desc: binding value

attributes.name: model-modifiers
attributes.desc: v-model modifiers, reference Vue modifiers(2.11.5)
attributes.optionValue: { lazy?: boolean, number?: boolean, trim?: boolean }

attributes.name: maxlength
attributes.desc: same as maxlength in native input

attributes.name: minlength
attributes.desc: same as minlength in native input

attributes.name: show-word-limit
attributes.desc: whether show word count, only works when type is 'text' or 'textarea'

attributes.name: word-limit-position
attributes.desc: word count position, valid when show-word-limit is true(2.11.5)

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.desc: placeholder of Input

attributes.name: clearable
attributes.desc: whether to show clear button, only works when type is not 'textarea'

attributes.name: clear-icon
attributes.desc: custom clear icon component(2.11.0)

attributes.name: formatter
attributes.desc: specifies the format of the value presented input.(only works when type is 'text')

attributes.name: parser
attributes.desc: specifies the value extracted from formatter input.(only works when type is 'text')

attributes.name: show-password
attributes.desc: whether to show toggleable password input

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.desc: whether Input is disabled

attributes.name: size
attributes.desc: size of Input, works when type is not 'textarea'

attributes.name: prefix-icon
attributes.desc: prefix icon component

attributes.name: suffix-icon
attributes.desc: suffix icon component

attributes.name: rows
attributes.desc: number of rows of textarea, only works when type is 'textarea'

attributes.name: autosize
attributes.desc: whether textarea has an adaptive height, only works when type is 'textarea'. Can accept an object, e.g. { minRows: 2, maxRows: 6 }

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.desc: same as autocomplete in native input

attributes.name: name
attributes.desc: same as name in native input

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.desc: same as readonly in native input

attributes.name: max
attributes.desc: same as max in native input

attributes.name: min
attributes.desc: same as min in native input

attributes.name: step
attributes.desc: same as step in native input

attributes.name: resize
attributes.desc: control the resizability

attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.desc: same as autofocus in native input

attributes.name: form
attributes.desc: same as form in native input

attributes.name: aria-label
attributes.desc: same as aria-label in native input(a11y) (2.7.2)

attributes.name: tabindex
attributes.desc: input tabindex

attributes.name: validate-event
attributes.desc: whether to trigger form validation

attributes.name: input-style
attributes.desc: the style of the input element or textarea element

attributes.name: label
attributes.desc: same as aria-label in native input(a11y) (deprecated)

attributes.name: inputmode
attributes.desc: same as inputmode in native input(2.10.3)

slots.name: prefix
slots.desc: content as Input prefix, only works when `type` is not 'textarea'

slots.name: suffix
slots.desc: content as Input suffix, only works when `type` is not 'textarea'

slots.name: prepend
slots.desc: content to prepend before Input, only works when `type` is not 'textarea'

slots.name: append
slots.desc: content to append after Input, only works when `type` is not 'textarea'

events.name: @change
events.desc: triggers when the input box loses focus or the user presses Enter, only if the modelValue has changed
events.param: Function(value: string | number, evt?: Event) => void

events.name: @input
events.desc: triggers when the Input value change

events.name: @clear
events.desc: triggers when the Input is cleared by clicking the clear button

events.name: @keydown
events.desc: triggers when a key is pressed down

events.name: @mouseleave
events.desc: triggers when the mouse leaves the Input element

events.name: @mouseenter
events.desc: triggers when the mouse enters the Input element

events.name: @compositionupdate
events.desc: triggers when the composition is updated

methods.name: select
methods.desc: select the text in input element
